# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using Threads

function pig_latinify(v::Vector{String})
    @threads map(s -> pig_latinify(s), v)
end

function pig_latinify(s::String)
    function starts_with_vowel(c::Char)
        return c in vowels
    end
    function starts_with_vowel(s::String)
        return starts_with_vowel(s[1])
    end
    consonants = "bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz"
    vowels = "aeiou"
    s2 = copy(s)
    s2[end+1:end+2] = "ay"
    if starts_with_vowel(s)
        return s2
    else
        pos = findfirst(startsWith_vowel, s)
        return s2[pos+1:end] * s2[1:pos]
    end
end
```
